source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a massive storm system. The scene features dark, turbulent storm clouds, characteristic of a supercell, moving over a vast, flat, grassy plain. The massive storm clouds are shown swirling and advancing rapidly across the landscape.
